2D Grid SimulationÂ¶

This example illustrates how to setup and run a curret clamp simulation, also known as a paced simulation on a single cell. To start, once PyLongQt is installed import it as seen below, this gives accesss to all of the classes and objects necessary to set up and run a simulation.

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.000 seconds)

Download Python source code: plot_2D_grid_example.py
Download Jupyter notebook: plot_2D_grid_example.ipynb
